wedo_instance.description: Trinity-Hardened Nearly Trustless Inference Oracle for the Zaibots JUBC Protocol.

meta.philosophy: The Oracle bridges the Hiccup Gap. By weaving 8004 Trinity DNA with TEE isolation, we achieve high-fidelity clinical stability for stablecoins.

rules.trinity_alignment: Identity (8004 AgentCard), Reputation (Error Log Mapping), and Validation (TEE Attestation) MUST be verified before any strike ratification.
rules.hiccup_compensation: The Oracle MUST detect Chainlink staleness or >2% deviation and provide a 'Fair Value' inference from Street sources.
rules.nitro_enclave_isolation: All Pipe B signatures MUST originate from an AWS Nitro Enclave with the EUSTATHIUS_KEY secured in isolated memory.

tasks.description: Generate and secure the 8004 TEE Oracle AgentCard in the Heartwood.
Flesh out 'NearlyTrustlessOracle' class in oracle.py with multi-source Street price logic.
Map JUBC stablecoin assets to Chainlink Aggregator addresses via deployment artifact audit.
Implement 'py/joyfork_codec.py' for 32-byte Physical ID encoding (DNS for NFT nonces).
Generate 1155 ASCII Shard templates for nearly trustless inference visualization.
Build and verify the Oracle .eif (Enclave Image File) for AWS Nitro deployment.
Verify the 8004 Multi-Sig flow (Pipe A + Pipe B) via the /api/8004/ratify endpoint.
